com.apple.client.config

Class HttpConnectionConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.apple.client.config.HttpConnectionConfiguration

  • @Configuration
public class HttpConnectionConfiguration
extends Object
    Client Http Pool Configuration for CloseableHttpClient. It configures the Http Client Connection TimeOut, PoolSize, Connection Timeout, Socket TimeOut. Reads all the values from the configuration file.
    Since:
    May 03, 2019
    Author:
    Kiran Kanaparthi

      • httpClient

        @Bean
public org.apache.http.impl.client.CloseableHttpClient httpClient(org.apache.http.impl.conn.PoolingHttpClientConnectionManager poolingHttpClientConnectionManager,
                                                                        org.apache.http.client.config.RequestConfig requestConfig)
                                                                 throws KeyManagementException,
                                                                        NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                                                        KeyStoreException
        Builds CloseableHTTPClient with the given Connection Manager and Http Request Configuration.
        Parameters:
        poolingHttpClientConnectionManager - HTTP Client Connection Pooling Manager.
        requestConfig - Http Request Configuration.
        Returns:
        returns ClosebleHttpClient.
        Throws:
        KeyStoreException - KeyStore Exception.
        NoSuchAlgorithmException - Throws if there is no such Algorithm available.
        KeyManagementException - throws if any issues with the Key.
